text: @realDonaldTrump GREAT TRANSITION! Several people who attended a high school swim party contracted COVID-19 Arkansas Governor Hutchinson noted the incident was "just an encouragement for us to be disciplined in our activities." Tell coronavirus to stay away from our 'activities' gonna get worse.
